properties.description:
pipe_BIA_AP_DEFERMENTS_V
Source: EBS
Destination: Azure OAC

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_AP_DEFERMENTS_V
WHERE  ACCOUNTING_DATE			>= sysdate -62
	OR GL_DATE					>= sysdate -62
	OR DEF_ACCTG_START_DATE		>= sysdate -62
	OR DEF_ACCTG_END_DATE		>= sysdate -62
	OR EXPENDITURE_ITEM_DATE	>= sysdate -62;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_AP_INVOICE_DIST_V
WHERE  LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -62;

SELECT * FROM APPS.BIA_OAC_PAYABLES_V
WHERE LAST_UPDATE_DATE >= sysdate -62;
